tasks.label: git-push
tasks.command: git stash --include-untracked && git pull --rebase origin main && git stash pop; rm -f scripts/git-check.sh; git add -A && git commit -m 'feat: add future-proof Copilot agent system with AI evolution layer, planning, and autonomy guardrails' && git push origin main && echo 'PUSHED TO MAIN'
